basics.name: Ali Khodabandeh Yalabadi
basics.label: AI Ph.D. Researcher
basics.summary: Ph.D. candidate and AI researcher with a strong focus on computational drug discovery, machine learning, and data science. Experienced in developing advanced AI models for drug-target interaction prediction, generative molecular design, and algorithmic fairness. Proficient in statistics, data analysis, and predictive modeling, with publications in top-tier venues. Adept at leading projects and managing cross-functional collaborations, combining technical expertise with business acumen. Background in industrial engineering, applying optimization and data-driven strategies to real-world AI challenges.

work.summary: Researching drug target interaction, drug discovery, and algorithmic fairness.
Machine Learning (Spring 2025), Data Preparation (Fall 2024), Computational Analysis of Social Complexity (Fall 2023), Data mining II (Summer 2023)
Designed and optimized data pipelines and workflows to automate business processes, reduce costs, and drive data-informed decisions.
Integrated Instagram data via APIs and applied image processing and Python-based preprocessing for age, gender detection, and analysis.

work.company: Farda Digital Transformation Studio, Tehran, Iran
work.summary: Developed business models and strategies using BP and Canvas frameworks, led financial forecasting and investor materials, and oversaw marketing analytics, hiring, and operations.
Led UI/UX design and product development, built strategic partnerships and teams, managed fundraising and finances, and drove innovation through customer-focused strategies.
